meanings.definition: A single-celled organism that is not an animal, plant, or fungus.
meanings.sent1: The protist under the microscope was very tiny.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study protists to learn more about microscopic life forms.
meanings.sent3: The protist tried to outsmart the microscope but failed.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, the protist was a tiny rebel.
meanings.sent5: Under the lens, the protist shimmered like a tiny gem.

meanings.definition: Any member of the kingdom Protista.
meanings.sent1: The pond was teeming with various protists swimming around.
meanings.sent2: Protists play a crucial role in the ecosystem as primary producers.
meanings.sent3: The protist party in the pond was the talk of the microbial town.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of Protista, each protist had its own unique role.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of protists in the water was a colorful spectacle.
